page.title: 13Village Life near Salterton
page.content: We interviewed a mother who lives in Knowle village near Budleigh Salterton She told us that the village park is very good as it keeps the children occupied when they have nothing better to do.The park contains a death slide, some swings,a see-saw and several climbing frames.Nobody worries about the noise made by the children. The mother told us that the village is about 400 years old and that although the village is a very busy one there is a lot of wild life and the most common animal is the fox. The family of the mother we inter- viewed have lived in Knowle village for seventy years. There is a village shop which sells almost anything a garage and a popular public house nick named The Dog and Donkey.
